summary:
Pepe2 - The 2nd most memeable memecoin in existence - Pepe 2 is tired of watching everyone play hot potato with the endless derivative ShibaCumGMElonKishuTurboAssFlokiMoon Inu coins. The Inu’s have had their day. It’s time for the most recognizable meme in the world to take his reign as king of the memes.

 How to Buy $PEPE2 - Create a Wallet

Download Metamask or your wallet of choice from the app store or google play store for free. Desktop users, download the google chrome extension by going to metamask.io.

Get Some ETH

Have ETH in your wallet to switch to $PEPE2. If you don’t have any ETH, you can buy ETH from an exchange or cross chain swap and send it to your wallet.

Go to Uniswap

Connect to Uniswap. Go uniswap.org in google chrome or on the browser inside your Metamask app. Connect your wallet. Paste the $PEPE2 token address into Uniwap and confirm the swap. When Metamask prompts you for a wallet signature, sign.

Switch ETH for $PEPE2

switch ETH for $pepe2. We have ZERO taxes so you don’t need to worry about buying with a specific slippage, although you may need to use slippage during times of market volatility.

 Tokenomics of $PEPE2 - Token Supply: 1,000,000,000

No Taxes, No Bullshit. It’s that simple.

LP tokens are burnt, and contract ownership is renounced.

 Roadmap of $PEPE2 - Phase 1: Meme

Phase 2: Vibe and HODL

Phase 3: Meme Takeover
